Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2008 06:03PM LisaW wrote: Hi all, I'm new to this but - started chemo Dec. 10th and had second dose January 2nd.  Am getting AC with Tax.  - neoadjuvant chemo.  Attempting to shrink tumor prior to surgurey.  This is all a bit tougher than I thought.  Can't wait for next week - week three is always better.  Anyone else doing neoadjuvant treatment? Lisa
